page.title: 05Lifestyle for Child,5 Rds
page.content: Wayne Murphy aged 11 gets up at 8:30 but does not like getting up early for school.His background is Welsh and he thinks this helps him in his schoolwork.A bus takes him to school. He enjoys lessons but prefers sport. His favourite sports are football,rugby and cricket.The schoolday ends at 3:15pm.He likes playing pool at Cynheidre club with his friends.He has a horse called Druid and there are twelve other horses on the smallholding owned by his family.He enjoys riding around Sylen Mountain.His favourite TV program is The Young Ones.He likes reading books and newspapers.His brother Eric is 19 and went to the Graig Comprehensive school.Wayne looks forward to going to the Graig this year.He goes to the Gower for his holidays every year.
